svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Correlation between internet usage and mean years of schooling, 2010
Internet usage is defined as internet users as a percentage of the population, and mean years of schooling is for
Mean years of schooling for those aged 15+
Internet users as a percentage of the population
Source: Barro Lee Education Dataset (2010), International Telecommunication Union (ITU) (2015)
